summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engr.Dept. authorizing the execution of contracts by the Director of Engr. with consultants, appraisers, counselors, property management & other professional services relating to our assisting with relocation of residents due to underground gas migration at the Midway Landfill; authorizing the Director to negotiate & enter into agreements with affected property owners, residents & tenants for evacuation, temporary relocation & other costs related to the effects of high levels of methane gas, when necessary for health & safety; authorizing the Director to negotiate for & purchase certain real property severely impacted by said underground gas migration; authorizing the Director to seek reimbursement of an expenditures made herein from State & Federal sources & responsible 3rd parties; making an appropriation from the Solid Waste Fund.
